ticket.description:
Example URL: http://colloquy.info/update.php?rss Example entry: ~~~~~ Version 2.1 (build 3263) June 6th beta build. Users that have 10.4 are strongly recommended to upgrade to 10.4.6, there are significant WebKit improvements and memory leak fixes that greatly improve Colloquy's performance when open for long durations.
  • New Sidebar mode. Nice and sleek like Mail in Tiger.
  • Makes the selected row in the Sidebar have white text.
  • Colloquy will once again display away or idle users with dimmed icons.
  • Cleans up the defaults, some of these have not been used for ages.
  • Switch over to use Sparkle to report application updates.
  • Better looking away status for members.
  • The WebSearch script was a bit much for a bundled plugin. It is now just a simple Google search script. /google and the context menu.
  • The /server command works again.
  • Pressing tab without starting a word to complete the nickname of the last user to send a message to the room with a highlight word, or the last completed nick. This only works if you are at the beginning of the line.
]]> 2006-06-06 ~~~~~ Needs to extract the URL from the `enclosure` node's `url` attribute and also store `sparkle:shortVersionString` and `sparkle:version` attributes in the `MirrorData` collection.
